chat_hist.text: Welcome to the overworld for the ParlAI messenger chatbot demo. Please type "begin" to start, or "exit" to exit
Welcome to the ParlAI Chatbot demo. You are now paired with a bot - feel free to send a message.Type [DONE] to finish the chat, or [RESET] to reset the dialogue history.
What a nice day! I'm glad I'm having it!
I'm so grateful for these children and how their lives are improving but I feel so sad for them because they're in a really tough situation.
